languages.text: "Тот суд... Людям не дали шанса искупить свою вину в бою, сражаясь во имя Его. Смерть без покаяния в огне битвы — это неправильно".
languages.translation_comment: Judged the RT's subjects at the Palace of Justice.

traits.locale_text: "Тот суд... Людям не дали шанса искупить свою вину в бою, сражаясь во имя Его. Смерть без покаяния в огне битвы — это неправильно".

languages.text: "That trial... Those people weren't allowed a chance to atone for their guilt in battle, fighting in His name. A death without repentance in the crucible of combat is wrong."
languages.translation_comment: Judged the RT's subjects at the Palace of Justice.
languages.original_text: "Тот суд... Людям не дали шанса искупить свою вину в бою, сражаясь во имя Его. Смерть без покаяния в огне битвы — это неправильно".

"That trial... Those people weren't allowed a chance to atone for their guilt in battle, fighting in His name. A death without repentance in the crucible of combat is wrong."

languages.text: 「あの審問…あの者たちは、陛下の名のもとで自らの罪を贖うために戦う機会すら与えられなかった。戦いの坩堝の中で、リペンタンスもなく死ぬなんて、間違ってる」
languages.original_text: "That trial... Those people weren't allowed a chance to atone for their guilt in battle, fighting in His name. A death without repentance in the crucible of combat is wrong."

traits.locale_text: 「あの審問…あの者たちは、陛下の名のもとで自らの罪を贖うために戦う機会すら与えられなかった。戦いの坩堝の中で、リペンタンスもなく死ぬなんて、間違ってる」

languages.text: "Dieser Prozess ... Die Leute haben keine Gelegenheit bekommen, im Kampf für ihre Schuld zu büßen, im Namen des Imperators zu kämpfen. Ein Tod, ohne im Fegefeuer des Kampfes Buße getan zu haben, ist falsch."
languages.original_text: "That trial... Those people weren't allowed a chance to atone for their guilt in battle, fighting in His name. A death without repentance in the crucible of combat is wrong."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Prozess ... Die Leute haben keine Gelegenheit bekommen, im Kampf für ihre Schuld zu büßen, im Namen des Imperators zu kämpfen. Ein Tod, ohne im Fegefeuer des Kampfes Buße getan zu haben, ist falsch."

languages.text: « Ce procès... Il aurait dû être permis à ces gens de se racheter en combattant au nom de l'Empereur. Une mort sans repentir dans le creuset de la bataille n'a pas de sens. »
languages.original_text: "That trial... Those people weren't allowed a chance to atone for their guilt in battle, fighting in His name. A death without repentance in the crucible of combat is wrong."

traits.locale_text: « Ce procès... Il aurait dû être permis à ces gens de se racheter en combattant au nom de l'Empereur. Une mort sans repentir dans le creuset de la bataille n'a pas de sens. »

languages.text: «Ese juicio... No se concedió a esa gente la oportunidad de expiar su culpa en combate, luchando en Su nombre. Una muerte sin arrepentimiento en el crisol de la batalla no es una muerte digna».
languages.original_text: "That trial... Those people weren't allowed a chance to atone for their guilt in battle, fighting in His name. A death without repentance in the crucible of combat is wrong."

traits.locale_text: «Ese juicio... No se concedió a esa gente la oportunidad de expiar su culpa en combate, luchando en Su nombre. Una muerte sin arrepentimiento en el crisol de la batalla no es una muerte digna».

languages.text: “那场审判……那些人没能得到机会以神皇的名义战斗，在战争中弥补他们的罪过。战死沙场却不曾悔改，这是错误的做法。”
languages.original_text: "That trial... Those people weren't allowed a chance to atone for their guilt in battle, fighting in His name. A death without repentance in the crucible of combat is wrong."

traits.locale_text: “那场审判……那些人没能得到机会以神皇的名义战斗，在战争中弥补他们的罪过。战死沙场却不曾悔改，这是错误的做法。”

languages.text: "O duruşmada O'nun uğruna savaşanlara işledikleri suçların bedelleri ödetilmedi. Cephede tövbe dahi edemeden can vermiş olmaları çok yazık."
languages.original_text: "That trial... Those people weren't allowed a chance to atone for their guilt in battle, fighting in His name. A death without repentance in the crucible of combat is wrong."
